thumb.title: He just wanted to catch a fish...
thumb.description: But the ocean had other plans.🎣 Giant Hook isn’t just a fishing game – it’s a deep-sea nightmare. Survive storms, monsters, and your own fear. 🪝 Wishlist now on Steam & be the first to uncover what lies beneath: 🔗 [https://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?l=finnish] 👇 Follow for exclusive content, devlogs & the darkest fishing trip of your life. #GiantHook #indiehorrorgame #fishinghorror #gamedev #horrorgame #survivalgame #indietok #wishlistnow #fyp
